io.hekate.rpc

Interface RpcLoadBalancer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LoadBalancer<RpcRequest>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRpcLoadBalancer

    public interface RpcLoadBalancer
extends LoadBalancer<RpcRequest>
    Client-side load balancer for RPC requests.

    This interface represents the RPC-specific version of a more generic LoadBalancer interface from the messaging API.

    Instances of this interface can be registered at configuration time via RpcClientConfig.setLoadBalancer(RpcLoadBalancer) or dynamically at runtime via RpcClientBuilder.withLoadBalancer(RpcLoadBalancer).

    For more details about load balancing please see the documentation of the LoadBalancer interface.

    See Also:
    RpcService, RpcRequest

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance.LoadBalancer

        route
